StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetHSListViewData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @star.ngRow int = 1, @PageSize int = 15, @SchoolId uniqueidentifier, @Gradua.onYear int )
AS
--This will return one more row that they asked for so that they know if there is another page of data. DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @star.ngRow + @PageSize
DECLARE @Sor.ngTable TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, SchoolId uniqueidentifier , PersonID uniqueidentifier , ProspectID uniqueidentifier , FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, LASTNAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, SocialSecurityNumber CHAR(9) NULL, ZipCode varchar(9) null, School VARCHAR(40) NULL, Telephone varchar(25) null, Category varchar(256) null, Sector varchar(50) null, Ac.onType varchar(100) NULL, Gradua.onYear int null, Source VARCHAR(40) NULL, DateAc.ve date.me Null)
DECLARE @Grid TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, SchoolId uniqueidentifier, PersonID uniqueidentifier , ProspectID uniqueidentifier , FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, LASTNAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, SocialSecurityNumber CHAR(9) NULL, ZipCode varchar(9) null, School VARCHAR(40) NULL, Telephone varchar(25) null, Category varchar(256) null, Sector varchar(50) null, Ac.onType varchar(100) NULL, Gradua.onYear int null, Source VARCHAR(40) NULL, DateAc.ve date.me Null)
INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable (RowNumber,personid,SchoolId,FIRSTNAME,LASTNAME,SocialSecurityNumber,Gradua.onYear) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By IE.PersonID), IP.personid, IE.SchoolId, P..rstname, P.lastname, P.SocialSecurityNumber, IE.Gradua.onYear FROM [usmc].[ImportEvent] IE inner join [usmc].[ImportPerson] IP on (IE.importeven.d = IP.importeven.d) inner join [usmc].[Person] P on (IP.personid = P.personid) where IE.SchoolId=@SchoolId and IE.ImportEventStatusTypeId =3 and IE.Gradua.onYear=@Gradua.onYear
INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT * FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE RowNumber >= @star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow
UPDATE @Grid SET
n.ZipCode = PA.ZipCode FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN PersonAddress PA on n.PersonID = PA.PersonId --INNER JOIN Address A on A.AddressId=PA.AddressId --where PersonAddressTypeId =1
UPDATE @Grid SET n.ProspectID = pr.ProspectID FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN Person p on n.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN Prospect pr on p.PersonID = pr.PersonID
UPDATE @Grid SET n.Telephone = pp.PhoneNumber FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN PersonPhone pp on n.PersonID = pp.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospect p on p.PersonID = pp.PersonId where PersonPhoneTypeId =1
UPDATE @Grid SET n.SchoolId=IE.SchoolId, n.School = HS.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME FROM @Grid n inner join ImportEvent IE on (n.SchoolId=IE.SchoolId) inner join [MCRISS-VDB01\PROCESSING].[mcriss].[dbo].[HIGH_SCHOOL] HS on (n.SchoolId=HS.rowguid) where IE.SchoolId=@SchoolId and IE.ImportEventStatusTypeId =3 and IE.Gradua.onYear=@Gradua.onYear
SELECT dis.nct RowNumber, SchoolId, PersonID, ProspectID, ISNULL(FIRSTNAME, '') as FIRSTNAME, ISNULL(LASTNAME, '') as LASTNAME, ISNULL(SOCIALSECURITYNUMBER, '') as SOCIALSECURITYNUMBER, ISNULL(ZIPCODE, '') as ZIPCODE, ISNULL(SCHOOL, '') as SCHOOL, ISNULL(TELEPHONE, '') as TELEPHONE, ISNULL(CATEGORY, '') as CATEGORY, ISNULL(SECTOR, '') as SECTOR, ISNULL(ACTIONTYPE, '') as ACTIONTYPE, ISNULL(Gradua.onYear, '') as Gradua.onYear, ISNULL(SOURCE,'') AS SOURCE, ISNULL(DATEACTIVE, '') as DATEACTIVE
FROM @Grid
